entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
